hooks.command: for file in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$file" =~ \.(pb\.go|_ttrpc\.pb\.go)$ ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit generated protobuf file: '$file; echo 'To modify, edit the .proto file and run: task protos'; exit 2; fi; done
for file in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$file" =~ \.go$ ]] && [[ ! "$file" =~ \.pb\.go$ ]]; then gofmt -w "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; goimports -w "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; done
